You can set the reactions you want the main pawn to have during standby or when quests are successfully completed, among other occasions.

You can set the <COL ffdc78>Pawn Reaction Settings</COL> from the Main Pawn menu in Riftstone.

Let's use emotes to showcase the pawn's personality, not just their appearance and speech.
